Module javafx.base
Package javafx.beans.binding

Interface NumberBinding

All Superinterfaces:
Binding<Number>, NumberExpression, Observable, ObservableNumberValue, ObservableValue<Number>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DoubleBinding, FloatBinding, IntegerBinding, LongBinding
public interface NumberBinding extends Binding<Number>, NumberExpression
A tagging interface to mark all Bindings that wrap a number-value.
Since:
JavaFX 2.0
See Also:

  • NumberExpression
